hero.name: IanHsu
hero.title: Full-Stack Engineer（Java / Spring Boot × Vue 3）
hero.subtitle: Skilled in designing scalable backend architectures and authorization systems using Spring Boot (JWT / RBAC / OAuth2), and building highly interactive front-end interfaces with Vue 3 + Pinia. Able to independently deliver end-to-end solutions—from database design and API development to deployment and front-end integration.

entry1.achievement1: Systematically studied Java, OOP, SQL, Web development, and Spring Boot; completed the capstone project and feature implementations
entry1.achievement2: Built RESTful APIs and applied fundamental security concepts (JWT / basic access control), establishing a maintainable backend structure
entry1.achievement3: Used Git / GitHub for version control and collaboration, and leveraged Docker to create a reproducible development environment

entry2.achievement1: Organized campus projects, course outcomes, event participation, and skill development into a one-page overview
entry2.achievement2: Enhanced storytelling and visual design by presenting growth and key achievements through a timeline and card-based layout
